Corequisites: CO-P: ACG 3341 OR ACG 3401 OR TAX 4001
Course Description: THEORY & METHODOLOGY OF FINANCIAL REPORTING, INCLUDES FASB'S CONCEPTUAL FRAMEWORK, THE ACCOUNTING PROCESS, FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, ACCOUNTING CHANGES, PRESENT VALUE & CURRENT ASSETS.PRESENT VALUE APPLICATIONS, AND CURRENT ASSETS.
Textbook(s): INTERMEDIATE ACCOUNTING BY KIESO, WEYGANDT, AND WARFIELD: 16TH EDITION.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
